mundipagg_info.label: Mundipagg - Payment methods
mundipagg_info.comment:
Allowed payment methods

  • - Credit card
  • - Boleto


Mundipagg module configuration page

enabled.label: Enable module logs
enabled.comment: Enable/disable Mundipagg Module log writing. Enabling this option will also enable the Magento default logs, on System -> Configuration -> Advanced -> Developer -> Log Settings. However, disabling it will not disable Magento default logs.

host_name.label: Add host name to log filename

non_default_dir.label: Save logs to non-default directory
non_default_dir.comment:
As default, the log files will be saved to the Magento default log directory, var/log, on Magento install root directory.
Enable this options to set a non-default log saving dir.

boleto_cards_config.label: General billet and credit card configuration

default_brand_header.label: Default configuration - Applicable to all brands

default_status.label: Enabled
default_status.comment: Set it as default for all credit card brands

visa_configuration.label: Visa configuration

mastercard_configuration.label: Mastercard configuration

hipercard_configuration.label: Hipercard configuration

diners_configuration.label: Diners configuration

vr_configuration.label: VR configuration

sodexo_configuration.label: Sodexo configuration
